column2: "Sɛ obi tse ntanka bi na ɔyɛ ho dasefo
"Anaa sɛ obi ka adze fi biara
column3: dɛ abowa bi a no ho nntsew no fun o
column4: fiebowa bi a no ho nntsew no fun o
column5: anaa aweaweabowa bi a no ho nntsew no fun o
column6: na sɛ oennhu mpo na no ho gu fi a

column2: "anaa sɛ ɔka nyimpa bi ne fi
column3: wɔ adze fi biara a nyimpa dze gu no ho fi no mu
column4: ber a onnyim mpo na sɛ ekyir yi ohu a

column2: "anaa sɛ obi ka ntanhun dɛ ɔbɛyɛ bɔn
column5: na n’adwen annkɔ do na sɛ ekyir yi n’enyi ba noho do a
column6: ɔno odzi ndzɛmba iyinom mu biara ho so:"

column3: odzi ndzɛmba iyinom mu biara ho so a
column4: ɔnka dza ɔayɛ mu bɔn no:"

column2: "na no bɔn a ɔayɛ no ntsi ɔmfa n’asodzii ho afɔr mbrɛ EWURADZE
column5: mfa nyɛ bɔn ho afɔr; na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma no wɔ no bɔn ho."

column2: "Na sɛ ne nsa annso eguambaa do a
column5: mbrɛ EWURADZE mbɛyɛ dza ɔayɛ mu bɔn ho n’asodzii ho afɔr; kor nyɛ bɔn ho afɔr
column6: na kor so nyɛ ɔhyew afɔr."

column3: ma ondzi kan mfa dza ɔyɛ bɔn ho afɔr no
column4: na ɔntsew ne tsir wɔ no kɔn do
column5: na mbom mma ɔmmpaa mu koraa:"

column2: "na ɔmfa bɔn ho afɔr bɔgyaa no bi mpetse afɔrmbukyia no nkyɛn; na bɔgya no ne nkaa no ɔnsɔn ngu afɔrmbukyia no ase: ɔyɛ bɔn ho afɔr."
"Na ɔmfa dza otsia ebien no nyɛ ɔhyew afɔr
column3: dɛ mbrɛ mbra no tse: na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma no wɔ no bɔn a ɔayɛ no ho

column2: "Na sɛ ne nsa annso ntamram ebien
column4: ɔno ɔmfa isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu kor nyɛ no bɔn a ɔayɛ no ho ayɛyɛdze mbra mbɛyɛ bɔn ho afɔr; mma ɔmmfa ngo nngu do
column5: nkyii so mma ɔmmfa krɔbɔw bi nnto do: na ɔyɛ bɔn ho afɔr."

column3: na ɔsɔfo no mfa mu ne nsapuw dɛ ne nkaadze
column4: na ɔnhyew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do
column5: wɔ EWURADZE ogya afɔr no do; ɔyɛ bɔn ho afɔr."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma no wɔ no bɔn a ɔayɛ no wɔ ndzɛmba iyinom mu biara mu no ho
column3: na wɔdze bɛkyɛ no: na nkaa no nyɛ ɔsɔfo no dze

column6: wɔ EWURADZE ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn no mu wɔ ber a ɔnndze enyidaho a; ɔno ɔmfa n’asodzii ho afɔr mbrɛ EWURADZE
column7: nguan mu oguannyin a onndzii dzɛm
column8: dɛ mbrɛ ebo a etwa wɔ dwetɛbona mu wɔ dwɛɛtɛɛ mu tse
column9: dɛ krɔnkrɔnbea dwetɛbona nyɛ asodzi ho afɔr:"

column2: "na ɔnyɛ ahyɛnanmu mma dza ɔayɛ no bɔn wɔ krɔnkrɔndze mu no
column3: na ɔmfa ebupɛn a otsia enum no nka ho
column4: na ɔmfa mma ɔsɔfo no; na ɔsɔfo no mfa asodzi ho afɔr oguannyin no mpata mma no

column3: na ɔyɛ ndzɛmba a EWURADZE ahyɛ ho mbra dɛ mma wɔnnyɛ no mu biara a; kaansa oennhu mpo a

column2: "Na ɔmfa nguan mu oguannyin a onndzii dzɛm dɛ mbrɛ ebo a etwa tse
column3: nyɛ asodzi ho afɔr mbrɛ ɔsɔfo no: na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma no wɔ adze a ɔafom wɔ mu na oennhu no no ho

column2: "Ɔyɛ asodzi ho afɔr: osiandɛ ampaara odzi EWURADZE enyim so."
